682520.name: Galactic Junk League - Pirate Launch Pack
682520.description:
The Pirate Launch Pack includes:

  • DLC exclusive Pirate ships Privateers, Insanity, Crazy Eye, Despot
  • complete Pirate building block set
  • 30x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 14 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 600 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Pirate Launch Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.
682520.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 匈牙利语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 罗马尼亚语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
